mainText:
It's interesting how in our modern culture we latch on to people we 
don't know. When the world lost Princess Diana many acted like they had 
lost a close friend. I didn't know Steve Jobs, but I know how he touched 
my life. It was in a real, and tangible way. I look at things partially 
because he provided many of us the vehicle to travel, to listen and to 
see the world and who we have become.
author: Myles
